segments.text: I'm observing the woman at the sink, still meticulously drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is so calm, so focused on her routine task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, water is absolutely gushing from the sink, creating a spreading puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see it slowly expanding, reaching closer and closer to her other foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of such a significant event right at their feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost comical, but also a bit distressing to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her serene action and the escalating flood is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's going to step back at some point and get a truly unpleasant surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the cold, slippery water seeping into her socks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of all that clean water just going to waste like this is somewhat upsetting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes me think about how easily we can miss what's happening around us.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She really has no idea what a mess she's about to discover.
segments.speaker: PAR
